description: Verify successful origin and destination selection with different cities.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and launched successfully.
The user is on the main booking screen.
testing_steps: Tap on the origin city field.
Select a city from the list (e.g., 'Delhi').
Verify 'Delhi' is displayed in the origin field.
Tap on the destination city field.
Select a different city (e.g., 'Hyderabad').
Verify 'Hyderabad' is displayed in the destination field.

description: Test app behavior with empty origin and destination fields.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and launched successfully.
The user is on the main booking screen.
testing_steps: Leave both origin and destination fields empty.
Tap on the 'SEARCH' button.

description: Check app response to special characters in origin/destination fields.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and launched successfully.
The user is on the main booking screen.
testing_steps: Enter special characters (e.g., '!@#$%^&*') in the origin field.
Tap on the 'SEARCH' button.
Enter special characters in the destination field.
Tap on the 'SEARCH' button.

description: Verify date selection functionality within the current year.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and launched successfully.
The user is on the main booking screen.
testing_steps: Tap on the date field.
Select a date within the current month.
Verify the selected date is displayed correctly.
Select a date from a different month within the current year.
Verify the selected date is displayed correctly.

description: Test app behavior when selecting past dates.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and launched successfully.
The user is on the main booking screen.
testing_steps: Tap on the date field.
Attempt to select a date prior to the current date.
Verify the app prevents selection of past dates or displays an error message.

description: Verify search functionality with minimum required criteria (origin and destination).
pre_conditions: The app is installed and launched successfully.
The user is on the main booking screen.
testing_steps: Select an origin city.
Select a destination city.
Leave the date field at its default value.
Tap on the 'SEARCH' button.
Verify the app performs a search and displays relevant results.

description: Test the app's response to a network interruption during a search.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and launched successfully.
The user is on the main booking screen.
The device is connected to the internet.
testing_steps: Select an origin city.
Select a destination city.
Select a travel date.
Initiate a search by tapping the 'SEARCH' button.
While the search is in progress, turn off the device's internet connection.
Observe the app's behavior for handling the network interruption - it should display an appropriate error message or allow the user to retry.

description: Verify that recent searches are saved and displayed correctly, including special characters.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and launched successfully.
The user is on the main booking screen.
testing_steps: Perform a search with a city name containing a special character (e.g., 'Pune (Maharashtra)').
Navigate away from the search results page (if applicable) and return to the main booking screen.
Scroll down to the 'RECENT SEARCHES' section.
Verify that the recent search is displayed, including the special character in the city name.

description: Test the 'Swap' functionality with no input in origin and destination fields.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and launched successfully.
The user is on the main booking screen.
testing_steps: Ensure both origin and destination fields are empty.
Tap on the 'Swap' icon.
Verify that either nothing happens (ideal) or the app displays a message prompting the user to select origin and destination first.

description: Check for potential issues with rapid tapping of the 'Swap' icon.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and launched successfully.
The user is on the main booking screen.
testing_steps: Select an origin city.
Select a destination city.
Rapidly tap the 'Swap' icon multiple times (at least 10 times).
Verify the app remains stable and doesn't crash, and the swap functionality works correctly after the rapid tapping.

description: Test the app's behavior with maximum recent searches and observe how overflow is handled.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and launched successfully.
The user is on the main booking screen.
The app has a defined limit for storing recent searches (if not, perform a large number of searches).
testing_steps: Perform enough searches to exceed the app's recent search storage capacity.
Navigate to the 'RECENT SEARCHES' section.
Verify the app handles the overflow appropriately - either by deleting the oldest searches, limiting the display to the maximum capacity, or using another method to manage the excess searches.

description: Verify 'Bus Hire' navigation and basic functionality.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and launched successfully.
The user is on the main booking screen.
testing_steps: Locate and tap on the 'Bus Hire' button.
Verify the app navigates to the correct 'Bus Hire' section or page.
Check if the 'Bus Hire' section loads correctly and displays relevant information or options.

pre_conditions: The app is installed and launched successfully.
The user is on the main booking screen.
testing_steps: Locate and tap on the 'rPool' button.
Verify the app navigates to the correct 'rPool' section or page.
Check if the 'rPool' section loads correctly and displays relevant information or options.

description: Test app stability with multiple rapid taps on 'Bus Hire' and 'rPool' buttons.
pre_conditions: The app is installed and launched successfully.
The user is on the main booking screen.
testing_steps: Rapidly tap on the 'Bus Hire' button multiple times (at least 10 times).
Observe if the app remains stable and doesn't crash or freeze.
Repeat the rapid tapping for the 'rPool' button.
Again, observe if the app remains stable and responsive.
